resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156717</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156717</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1210</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Breaking News from ‘The Egypt Times’1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechen von von Nachrichten vom?The Ägypten 
Times?1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rupture des nouvelles de ?The Egypte Times?1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quebrando a notícia do?The Egipto Times?1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rompere le notizie da?The Egitto Times?1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σπάζοντας ειδήσεις από ?The Αίγυπτος Times?1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Romper noticias del?The Egipto Times?1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners write newspaper articles describing key events that took place in the exodus of Egypt, using newspaper headlines given.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">exodus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">egypt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">article</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger schreiben die Zeitungsartikel, die 
Schlüsselfälle beschreiben, die im Exodus von Ägypten stattfanden 
mit den gegebenen Zeitung Schlagzeilen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants écrivent des articles de journal 
décrivant les événements principaux qui ont eu lieu dans l'exode de
l'Egypte, en utilisant des titres de journal donnés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners escrevem os artigos de jornal que 
descrevem os eventos chaves que ocorreram no exodus de Egipto, usando 
os headlines do jornal dados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti scrivono gli articoli di stampa 
che descrivono gli eventi chiave che hanno avvenuto nel exodus 
dell'Egitto, usando i titoli del giornale dati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι γράφουν τα άρθρα εφημερίδων περιγράφοντας
τα βασικά γεγονότα που πραγματοποιήθηκαν στην έξοδο της Αιγύπτου,
χρησιμοποιώντας τους τίτλους εφημερίδων που δόθηκαν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los principiantes escriben los artículos 
periodísticos que describen los acontecimientos dominantes que 
ocurrieron en el éxodo de Egipto, usando los títulos del periódico 
dados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Exodus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ägypten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Artikel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Judentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exode</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Egypte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">article</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">exodus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Egipto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">artigo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">exodus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">l'egitto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">articolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έξοδος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αίγυπτος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άρθρο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">éxodo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Egipto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">artículo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">judaísmo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
